ERROR_ON_SAVE: An error occured while saving data. Please try again.
LOGOUT_MESSAGE: Do you really want to logout from app? Unsynced surverys will disappear.
UPLOAD_SURVEY_MESSAGE: Do you want to upload the surveys?
AREA_CODE_NOT_FOUND: Area code not found, please enter correct area code.
ENTER_VALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address.
SALESFORCE_OBJECT_CREATION_ERROR: Error while creating record on salesforce.
DELETE_MESSAGE: Are you sure to delete this survey? This cannot be undone.
SYNC_MESSAGE: Are you sure to upload this survey? This cannot be undone.
HEROKU_APP_NAME_DESCRIPTION: Enter your Heroku app name. For example, if the URL of your Heroku app is https://aaa-bbb-12345.herokuapp.com, enter aaa-bbb-12345. Ask your administrator for details.
